name: Gold Pride - Roller Baller
effectText: If your LP are lower than your opponent's: You can Special Summon this card from your hand. During the Main Phase (Quick Effect): You can Fusion Summon 1 "Gold Pride" Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, using monsters from your hand or field as material. You can only use each effect of "Gold Pride - Roller Baller" once per turn.
